name: @hoyomi/crawler
description: A lightweight, composable conversion toolkit for extracting structured and type-safe data from raw HTML documents.

scripts.build: rm -f index.d.ts && rm -f index.js && bun build index.ts --outfile=index.js -e dayjs -e cheerio -e chrono-node && tsup index.ts --dts-resolve --dts-only -d ./ --format esm
scripts.release: bumpp && bun run build && bun publish
